attributes.action: UK Government's Immediate commitment to not introduce the digital ID scheme.
attributes.additional_details: Scrap the scheme immediately or call a, referendum
attributes.background:
More details

The government will potentially reassure the public that this is not a step towards, digital control and mass surveillance.  
This should be discussed with the utmost urgency and importance with the view to immediate cancellation of the scheme or a referendum on the subject.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not introduce Digital ID cards
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730194
